package.name: example
package.title: Example 0.4
package.description: Example is a demonstration module for handling bookmarks. It is similar to the normal bookmarks module, but does not contain categories. A new folder "Example" is created under "/Workspace/Extensions/". v0.3: added PHP include view v0.4: added validator example License: GNU GPL v2 Author: Copyright (C) 2010 by Example Author
